findings.title: Inconsistent minted and deposited LP tokens amount
findings.description: Function `deposit` in `Booster` allows to deposit curve pools LP token and mint wrapped convex tokens with 1:1 proportions. However minted tokens amount for user can be different from deposited LP tokens amount.

findings.title: Wrong logic in `withdrawAll`
findings.description: The `withdrawAll` method has incorrect logic, counting balance as `balanceOfPool(_gauge)` instead of `balanceOfPool(_gauge).add(IERC20(_token).balanceOf(address(this)))`, potentially causing tokens to remain in the contract.

findings.title: Cache `poolInfo` in memory to save gas
findings.description: In function `deposit` of `Booster` contract, cache `poolInfo` structure in memory to save some gas on reading.
